channel.title: Crowdfunding Collection #185, including every tabletop rpg project started between 11/15 and 11/22
channel.description: I present to you the new Crowdfunding Collection #185, including every tabletop rpg project started between 11/15 and 11/22. The collection is back with quite some magazines in the context of the #SideQuest. One cool ttrpg I want to single out is LATAM. I missed it in the last collection, thus added it back. It’s very cool and you should have a look. The post should have been published on Sunday yet somehow I missed it. Thus it covers last week (see timeframe) German Crowdfundings 1 Roleplaying Game English Crowdfundings 6 Roleplaying Games 4 Magazine Roleplaying Games 3 Settings 2 Sourcebooks 3 D&D 5E Sourcebooks 2 Adventures 2 Dice Projects 2 Accessoires 1 Deck of Cards 3 Map Projects 1 Actual Play 2 Various RPG Projects 1 Palor Game Spanish Crowdfundings 1 Adventure French Crowdfundings 2 Roleplaying Games 1 Deck of Cards Article: https://teylen.blog/2021/11/27/crowdfunding-collection-185/

item.title: Crowdfunding Collection #185, including every tabletop rpg project started between 11/15 and 11/22
item.dc:creator: @Teylen
item.description:
@Teylen wrote:

I present to you the new Crowdfunding Collection #185, including every tabletop rpg project started between 11/15 and 11/22.

The collection is back with quite some magazines in the context of the #SideQuest. One cool ttrpg I want to single out is LATAM. I missed it in the last collection, thus added it back. It’s very cool and you should have a look.

The post should have been published on Sunday yet somehow I missed it. Thus it covers last week (see timeframe)

German Crowdfundings

1 Roleplaying Game

English Crowdfundings

6 Roleplaying Games
4 Magazine Roleplaying Games
3 Settings
2 Sourcebooks
3 D&D 5E Sourcebooks
2 Adventures
2 Dice Projects
2 Accessoires
1 Deck of Cards
3 Map Projects
1 Actual Play
2 Various RPG Projects
1 Palor Game

Spanish Crowdfundings

1 Adventure

French Crowdfundings

2 Roleplaying Games
1 Deck of Cards

Article: https://teylen.blog/2021/11/27/crowdfunding-collection-185/
